name: Project Hell Soul
description:
Project Hell Soul is a prototype for real time action MMO for the browser and phone.

A portal to hell has opened up on a far off island and an outpouring of vicious, nightmarish demons threaten the world. Team up with your friends, level up, obtain new weapons and armor, and take the fight to them!

Project Hell Soul is heavily inspired by games like Realm of the Mad God and we're here with a suuuuuuper early prototype to get your feedback and suggestions!

Be sure to let us know what you think, report any bugs you encounter, and tell us what you'd like to see in future versions!
